sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-main-page', template: `
{{category.title}}

{{item.name}}

Ver más

Ofertas y Promociones

{{deal.name}}

{{deal.discount}} de descuento

Ver oferta
`, styles: [` .card { transition: box-shadow .3s; } .card:hover { box-shadow: 0 0 11px rgba(33,33,33,.2); } `] }) export class MainPageComponent { categories = [ { title: "Accesorios para juegos", items: [ { name: "Auriculares", image: "assets/headset.jpg" }, { name: "Teclados", image: "assets/keyboard.jpg" }, { name: "Ratones", image: "assets/mouse.jpg" }, { name: "Sillas", image: "assets/chair.jpg" } ] }, { title: "Novedades en hogar", items: [ { name: "Cocina", image: "assets/kitchen.jpg" }, { name: "Decoración", image: "assets/decor.jpg" }, { name: "Limpieza", image: "assets/cleaning.jpg" }, { name: "Organización", image: "assets/organization.jpg" } ] }, { title: "Electrónicos", items: [ { name: "Laptops", image: "assets/laptop.jpg" }, { name: "Tablets", image: "assets/tablet.jpg" }, { name: "Smartphones", image: "assets/smartphone.jpg" }, { name: "Accesorios", image: "assets/accessories.jpg" } ] }, { title: "Software y Servicios", items: [ { name: "Antivirus", image: "assets/antivirus.jpg" }, { name: "Diseño", image: "assets/design.jpg" }, { name: "Productividad", image: "assets/productivity.jpg" }, { name: "Almacenamiento", image: "assets/storage.jpg" } ] } ]; deals = [ { name: "SSD 1TB", image: "assets/ssd.jpg", discount: "25%" }, { name: "Monitor 27\"", image: "assets/monitor.jpg", discount: "15%" }, { name: "Router WiFi 6", image: "assets/router.jpg", discount: "20%" }, { name: "Cámara web HD", image: "assets/webcam.jpg", discount: "30%" } ]; }
